A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Killing Snoke was a bad idea. We don't even know\, who he is. Besides that you can't tell me that one of the powerful sithlords ever won't recognise the turning lightsaber beside him. I also would love to see Kylo Ren turning back to the light side. Oh and I think Rey and Kylo Ren/Ben Solo would be a wonderful couple.
